experimentData.title: Experiment Data
experimentData.description: View and manage data associated with this experiment.

dataSources.title: Data Sources
dataSources.description: This section will show datasets, files, and other data sources associated with your experiment.

dataCollection.title: Data Collection
dataCollection.description: Configure data collection settings and monitor progress here.

dataAnalysis.title: Data Analysis
dataAnalysis.description: Analysis results and reports will appear here once data collection begins.

uploadModal.title: Upload Sensor Data
uploadModal.description: Upload sensor data to your experiment for analysis

sensorFamily.label: Select Sensor Family
sensorFamily.description: Choose the type of sensor data you want to upload

ambyte.label: Ambyte
ambyte.description: Upload Ambyte sensor folders containing measurement data

fileUpload.title: Upload Ambyte Data
fileUpload.description: Select an Ambyte folder (e.g., "Ambyte_10") or individual ambit subfolders (e.g., "1", "2", "3", "4"). The folder should contain .txt measurement files.
fileUpload.browseInstruction: Click to browse for an Ambyte data folder

uploading.title: Uploading Data
uploading.description: Please wait while we process your sensor data...

success.title: Upload Successful
success.description: Your sensor data has been uploaded successfully and is now available for analysis.

validation.title: Validation Errors:
validation.selectFolder: Please select a folder containing Ambyte data, not individual files
validation.invalidStructure: Invalid Ambyte folder structure. Expected folders like 'Ambyte_10' or numbered folders '1', '2', '3', '4'
validation.fileSizeExceeded: {{count}} file(s) exceed the maximum size limit of 100MB
